website_summaries.verdict: A traditional indoor bug spray that won't leave any residue.
pros: No nasty, oily leftovers or odor after use
Protects from ants, roaches, and other insects
Includes an extension tube to direct spray into cracks and small spaces
cons: Product takes a fair amount of time to dry
Spray can quickly fill room with chemicals if not applied directly into a crack

customer_reviews.title: Works - but you need a mask.
customer_reviews.text: This works great on roaches. My house gets them every summer. BUT, unless you get the UNSCENTED version of this, which is kind of hard to find, make sure you put some kind of mask on whenever you spray this. The first use of it had me coughing so hard I had to go outside to breathe. Other than feeling like you've been gassed, the product works well.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Roaches be gone
customer_reviews.text: This stuff actually works. I purchased it for my gas hot water heater because I didn’t want to blow myself up. I had German roaches. Definitely wear a mask when using and don’t plan on spending any time where this was sprayed for an hour or so.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: The smell is really BAD!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs to know that this product is very bad for your health. Every time I spray I have to cough so much. My dog even throw up because of the horrible smell. Do not use this with out a mask and make sure no one is around when spraying. They should take this off the market.... So bad!
customer_reviews.author: CarlBel

customer_reviews.title: It works! But it STINKS!!! Black Flag Dry Ant and Roach Killer Aerosol
customer_reviews.text: This DEFINITELY works. But DAMN does it STINK! I actually have to spray and leave the room....quickly...or I choke. It actually takes my breath away....BUT it works...
customer_reviews.author: A. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: doesnt seem to work on large roaches
customer_reviews.text: does not kill large roaches on contact unless maybe if you spray enough to drown them.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product , just use a mask
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product , you definitely need a chemical mask when using this product since it contains pyrethrin which will cause you to cough, choke , if you don’t use a mask , it’s a flush and will expose any hidden bugs , but take my advice use a chemical mask
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Rizzuto

customer_reviews.title: Kills them dead
customer_reviews.text: A good product. I have used black flag warpath in the past but I guess it is not made anymore. This product has cleared my house of roaches within two weeks
customer_reviews.author: TREEMAN

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It works as described, even weeks after applying I find dead Roaches , It is really strong make sure you use some kind of protection and definitely have no one else around when spraying!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Torres

customer_reviews.title: It cause very cough
customer_reviews.text: This is not good for health coz whenever I use it all of my family member get badly cough though I used it another room and I used mask the cough make me vomiting ! But roaches are not gone
customer_reviews.author: AKM Shamsul Arafin

customer_reviews.title: The lid is very uncomfortable to open
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't open easely the lid so I broke and and to threw it away
customer_reviews.author: leniyems

customer_reviews.title: Helps, but not a cureall
customer_reviews.text: This helps. But it really depends on how much you apply, where you apply, etc. Spray concentration in certain hard to reach areas makes it hard to saturate certain areas of the house. This is going to make whatever room you spray stink for a little while after you spray a bit (maybe an hour?). Reminded me of paint fumes. I think it helped flush out a small roach a couple of minutes or even hours after I sprayed. And it made some areas rather unpleasant for the larger roaches. I don't know if it killed any roaches outright though as the crevice areas that I sprayed are very difficult to see or reach into.
customer_reviews.author: bandazar

customer_reviews.title: It’s getting to be that time again
customer_reviews.text: Despite the never ending cold and snow, Spring is sort of here with the dahlias beginning to bloom – and a few ants scurrying around. More accurately they were scurrying around. They are no longer in evidence. This spray comes out wet but visibly dried within a half hour. The manufacturer claims it kills roaches for up to six months. Hopefully we won’t have to verify that claim. Like many sprays, this comes with a straw that allows you to direct the spray. The odor isn’t offensive, though you won’t be wanting to use this for your aromatherapy. In all, this seems to work well. Jerry
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Saperstein

customer_reviews.title: Dry formula works well with no greasy oily residue or lingering smell...
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure what "dry formula" meant, but I have used this and was impressed. Controlled the ants without the oily residue and heavy sweet odor that I normally associate with Black Flag products. Have always been impressed with Black Flag results, but the smell and the cleanup was a pain. This formula seems to eliminate those concerns. Used it on my front walk on numerous ant hills. The pressure from the can destroyed the hills, the product in the can killed the ants, and they have not been back. Will update the review if they return...
customer_reviews.author: R. Ballister

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I used this as soon as I saw ants and have not seen any since. The smell is not bad and the directional tube helps you to aim it in cracks and crevices, under furniture, etc. The spray is more powdery then wet and the nozzle didn't plug up, which was nice. Not safe around food or pets. Best to spray and then leave the room for a while, making sure no open food containers are out.
customer_reviews.author: audrey frances

customer_reviews.title: It works and is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Be really careful using this around anyone with breathing difficulty or asthma. It will trigger them. That said, this product is effective, and once it settles, it won't aggravate (in my experience) an asthma sufferer. I use this for ants inside the house along the outer wall. It works and is easy to use. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kills more than ants/roaches.
customer_reviews.text: Got spiders hiding in that tiny space between baseboards and flooring? Flush them and everything else hiding in there out with this stuff. Then go back with a caulking gun and seal all those cracks. Also sprayed it into the space behind outlets in the wall.
customer_reviews.author: notengo unnombre

customer_reviews.title: Works on Contact
customer_reviews.text: Funny story. I get this from Amazon and as soon as I open the box, I see a roach. I typically don’t get roaches but here is one. I take the can, aim and fire. The nasty roach runs and then collapses and starts to jerk and dies. True story. So this does work on contact. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Roy of Columbia

customer_reviews.title: This product works
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ant killer, a pest that's a problem at my home. I had an ant hill in my yard. Had they stayed outdoors, I wouldn't have had to use the spray. This product works! The spray comes out in a thick stream allowing you to spray from a distance. I noticed no odor or stickiness.
customer_reviews.author: K K Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: easy to spray into hard to get places.
customer_reviews.text: So far the spray seems to working well. I like it because it can be sprayed into hard to reach places. We live in the country and there are lots of nooks and crannies in the house. I have seen a reduction in roach sighting around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This worked good to keep the ants away, I sprayed this into some crevices where they usually get into and I had a great season of no ants. It was wet when I sprayed it but dries fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. ChaCha

customer_reviews.title: Great bug spray
customer_reviews.text: Put this to use immediately! Bummer ! But it works great. Sprays better than other versions not sure why but it is smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Zolar

customer_reviews.title: Great product that comes out strong to kill insects
customer_reviews.text: Great product that comes out strong to kill insects, but doesn't leave any sticky or smelly remains from the chemicals. It's great for inside the house.
customer_reviews.author: Fathom

customer_reviews.title: Love it, nothing much else to say
customer_reviews.text: Instant Death Spray. Love it, nothing much else to say. Seems fair given the listed price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Maiden

product_meta.title: Black Flag Dry Ant and Roach Killer Aerosol, 9-Ounce
product_meta.description: Insects invading your corner of the world? Whatever insect you're fighting, Black Flag products are dedicated to providing the tools you need to regain control. With formulas that act fast and never back down, Black Flag insect controls have been arming homeowners in the battle against invading bugs for more years than any other brand. Black Flag Dry Ant & Roach Killer controls roaches, ants (excluding pharaoh ants and fire ants), carpenter ants, spiders, crickets, firebrats and silverfish with quick-killing action. Use this non-staining, dry formula indoors to flush listed insects out of cracks and crevices and kill them on contact. Keeps controlling German cockroaches for up to 6 months. Spiders (including black widow and wolf spiders) must be sprayed directly to be killed. Leaves no odor behind. Use the extension tube to direct spray into cracks and crevices in walls; dark corners of rooms, cabinets and closets; along and behind baseboards; beneath and behind sinks, stoves, refrigerators and cabinets; around plumbing and other utility installations; around waste containers and wherever else these pests may find entrance. Use along and behind baseboards, appliances, sinks, pipes and plumbing. To treat fleas and brown dog ticks, spray infested areas such as pet beds and resting quarters. Remove old pet bedding and clean or replace with clean, fresh bedding. Pets should not be treated with this product – to control the source of flea infestations, treat your pet with a product registered for application to animals.
feature_bullets: USE INDOORS: Protects your home from ants, roaches and other listed insects
DRY FORMULA: Leaves no oily residue and no odor
FLUSHES OUT INSECTS: Extension tube (included) helps direct spray into cracks and crevices
KILLS UP TO 6 MONTHS: Residual formula keeps on killing for 6 months against German cockroaches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars114 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
